_header: Sweet Lord I thank Thee as I can
_description: A thanksgiving to Christ — forty-nine lines in couplets

BLAru285.First Lines: SWeit lord I thank þe as I canThat michtlie þi pains begane…
BLAru285.Last Lines: …To þe quhilk Ioy and lestand blisWe mot cum quhair all saintis Is
